= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Rods and Cones (eye-edge-output)*: after on-center/off-center edge extraction and zipping 100:1
  * *Somatic Receptors (eye-somatic)*: eye -> semilunar ganglion/ophthalmic -> PTR
  * *Visceral Receptors (eye-visceral)*: eye -> semilunar ganglion/ophthalmic -> STR, proprioception
  * *Inferior Oblique, and Superior, Medial, and Inferior Rectus Muscles (eye-muscle-rotate-major)*: levator palpebrae superioris, the inferior oblique, and superior, medial, and inferior rectus muscles
  * *Superior Oblique Muscles (eye-muscle-rotate-minor)*: superior oblique, rotation in a vertical plane – looking down and up, rotation in the plane of the face
  * *Lateral Rectus (eye-muscle-rotate-vestibular)*: lateral rectus, quick turn to the right -> compensatory reflex turning of two eyes to the left
  * *Ciliary Muscle (eye-muscle-curvature)*: to ciliary muscle to accomodate eye
  * *Sphincter Pupillae Muscle (eye-muscle-pupil-close)*: to sphincter pupillae to close pupil
  * *Dilator Pupillae Muscle (eye-muscle-pupil-open)*: to dilator pupillae to open pupil
